data.text: Bangʼ mano, Ayub nowuoyo ka kwongʼo chiengʼ mane onywole.
Ayub nowacho kama:
“Mad chiengʼ mane onywolaeni lal nono,
Odiechiengno mad lokre mudho;
Mad odiechiengno otim luoch kendo mudho mandiwa oime;
Otienono, mad olal e mudho mandiwa;
Mad otienono bed migumba;
Mad joma kwongʼo odiechienge okwongʼ odiechiengno,
Mad sulwege mokinyi lokre mudho;
nikech ne ok oloro dhoudi mag ii minwa
“Dine atho ei minwa,
Angʼo momiyo minwa nopira e chonge
Nimar dikoro ayweyo gi kwe;
gi ruodhi kaachiel gi jongʼad rieko mag piny,
kaachiel gi joloch mane nigi dhahabu,
Koso angʼo mane omono panda ei liel ka nyathi monywol kosetho,
Kuno joma timbegi richo weyoe timbegigo,
Joma ni e twech kuno bende winjo maber;
Jomatindo gi jomadongo ni kuno
“Angʼo momiyo ichiwo ngima ne joma winjo malit,
gigombo tho, to tho ok neg-gi,
gin joma opongʼ gi mor
Angʼo momiyo owe ngʼato ka ngima
Nikech kuyo kod ywak omona chiemo;
Gima ne aluoro ema koro osemaka;
Aonge gi kwe, chunya chandore;
